titleStmt.title: The Book of rates now used in the sin custom-house of the church of Rome containing the priees [sic] of the bulls, dispensations and pardons for all manner of villanies and wickednesses, with the several sums of monies given and to be paid for them / published by Anthony Egane ...
titleStmt.author: Egan, Anthony, B.D.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
